title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message:
Hello, I have searched the forum for other messages but I have not seen anything similar to my problem.

The equipment turns on and after a second the backlight does not work. With a PRAM reset now the device keeps the backlight until almost the end of the block and it disappears, it gets to the user screen and it still doesn't work. I have done several PRAM resets and I have tried another screen but the same problem..

any ideas? thanks !

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message:
Any history available?
Check BKL_EN/PWM when the problem appears.
What is backlight output voltage behavior?

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message:
history anything  never any problem

BKL_EN=2,80v
BKL_PWM=1,44v

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message:
Test starting in safe and also SMC bypass mode.

Backlight always present if keep the machine in boot menu?

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message:
It doesn't work in safe mode at any time. And I have tried three pram resets and neither. 

Before at least it worked a few seconds after the pram...

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message:
Remove R7704 and run wire from 3V3_S0 to BKL_PWM.
Confirm if you get full backlight; no adjust possible.
Then do PRAM reset 2-3 times.
Remove the wire and put back R7704; still working?

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message: hello again, I remove R7704 and run wire from C7711 (point 1 PP3V3_S0) to R7704 (point 2 BKL_PWM) but I don't get full backlight, too I try 3 times pram reset

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message:
Post actual BKL_EN/PWM levels.

Did you try known good LCD assembly?

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message:
BLK_EN= 2,80v
BKL_PWM=3,29v

yes my lcd with other board full work

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message: What is backlight output voltage in this case?

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message: hi, 8,50v in fuse BKL

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message: You can check backlight output voltage at C7797/99, or pins 3/4 of J8300.

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message:
Hi again

all points c7797/97 and J8300 = 8,50v solid

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message: I still keep this change "remove R7704 and run wire from 3V3_S0 to BKL_PWM"

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message: Just in case, replace L/D7701.

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message:
hi again, sorry but I replace L7701 and D7701 and same problem... I have 8,52v

I try 3 times pram.. arggg board ! ;D thanks

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message: It works now?

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message: no don't work..

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message: Did you change U7701?

title: A1466 820-00165-A backlight dont work
message: no never for this board, but I try it. thanks
